statements: SELECT * FROM VirtualTeamMembers;
SELECT member_name, member_position FROM VirtualTeamMembers;
SELECT * FROM VirtualTeamMembers WHERE member_position = 'Manager';
SELECT member_id, member_name FROM VirtualTeamMembers ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT member_name, member_position FROM VirtualTeamMembers WHERE member_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM VirtualTeamMembers WHERE member_position = 'Manager' ORDER BY member_name ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM VirtualTeamMembers WHERE member_position = 'Developer' ORDER BY member_email DESC
SELECT member_id, member_position FROM VirtualTeamMembers WHERE member_name LIKE '%son%'
SELECT * FROM VirtualTeamMembers WHERE member_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY member_position ASC
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM VirtualTeamMembers WHERE member_position = 'Designer' AND member_id > 4
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM team_members;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM team_roles;
SELECT member_id, member_name, member_email FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, member_phone_number FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT member_name, role_name FROM team_members JOIN team_roles ON team_members.member_id = team_roles.role_id;
SELECT member_name, role_name FROM team_members JOIN team_roles ON team_members.member_id = team_roles.role_id WHERE team_roles.role_name = 'Developer';
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT full_name, email FROM team_members ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT role_name FROM team_roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM team_members WHERE phone_number LIKE '%-123';
SELECT * FROM team_assignments ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT full_name, email FROM team_members WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT role_name, full_name FROM team_roles JOIN team_assignments ON team_roles.role_id = team_assignments.role_id JOIN team_members ON team_members.member_id = team_assignments.member_id;

SELECT full_name, role_name FROM team_members JOIN team_assignments ON team_members.member_id = team_assignments.member_id JOIN team_roles ON team_roles.role_id = team_assignments.role_id ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_assignments, full_name FROM team_members JOIN team_assignments ON team_members.member_id = team_assignments.member_id GROUP BY full_name HAVING total_assignments > 1;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM TeamMembers WHERE position='Manager';
SELECT team_name, COUNT(member_id) AS members_count FROM Teams JOIN TeamAssignments ON Teams.team_id = TeamAssignments.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT project_name, description FROM TeamProjects WHERE team_id=1 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT name, position FROM TeamMembers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT name, email FROM TeamMembers WHERE position='Manager';
SELECT team_name, COUNT(member_id) AS team_size FROM Teams JOIN TeamAssignments ON Teams.team_id = TeamAssignments.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT tm.name, tp.project_name FROM TeamMembers tm JOIN TeamAssignments ta ON tm.id = ta.member_id JOIN TeamProjects tp ON ta.team_id = tp.team_id WHERE ta.role='Leader';
SELECT * FROM TeamProjects WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT member_name,email FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT project_id,project_name FROM Projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT team_name,team_lead_id FROM Teams WHERE team_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT task_description,assigned_to FROM Tasks WHERE assigned_to = 1;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT team_name, team_lead_id FROM Teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, team_name FROM Projects JOIN Teams ON Projects.team_id = Teams.team_id WHERE Projects.project_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(project_id) AS total_projects FROM Teams JOIN Projects ON Teams.team_id = Projects.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT member_name, skill_name FROM TeamMembers JOIN Skills ON TeamMembers.member_id = Skills.skill_id;
